Text:
function RYU_EP05_05()
    -- .起-3【1月第3週】「あまりにも早い終わり」
    SaveData.Title = "あまりにも早い終わり"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（冬）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    MSG([[The first strange feeling I noticed when I arrived at school was that I never encountered Uran-san while walking down the main street.]])

    MSG([[Usually, this would be the place where I’d greet Uran-san first.]])

    MSG([[It was the first time since we started dating that I hadn't exchanged words with Uran-san before reaching the school building.]])

    -- //1-A教室
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（通常）、モブ女子生徒×２
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1977.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Normal "Good day, everyone. Have you seen Uran-san? I went to the classroom to see her, but it seems she's not there."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0461.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Surprised "Huh? We haven’t seen her."]])

PLAY_VOICE("kyohka_0037.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Kyouka Himekaidou】 "Perhaps she’s drinking tea in the Japanese-style room?"]])

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0035.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Reika Sakurajima】 "That must be it! It sounds just like Uran-sama!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1978.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Wry smile "That might be the case. I'll go check the Japanese-style room."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- //BG：和室
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG022aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[Peeking into the Japanese-style room, there was no one there. Moreover, it seemed tidier than usual.]])

    MSG([[Looking closely, none of Uran-san’s usual tea utensils were there.]])

    MSG([[A strange unease settled in my chest, so I left the Japanese-style room.]])


    -- //BG：1-A廊下
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｆ
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
--LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
--WAIT(500)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0059.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran Ryuguuin】 "Erika onee-sama, I need to talk to you."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1979.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Surprised "Ryuguuin-san? What’s the matter?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[Just as I returned to the first-year floor, my classmate Ryuguuin-san stopped me.]])

    MSG([[Though looking somewhat hesitant, Ryuguuin-san continued speaking.]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0060.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran Ryuguuin】 "I don’t have concrete information yet, but... it seems Uran-sama is taking a leave of absence starting today."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1980.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Alarmed "A l-leave of absence!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I couldn’t help but raise my voice, then covered my mouth.]])

    MSG([[After confirming the people around hadn’t overheard, I asked carefully.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1981.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Why is Uran-san taking a leave of absence? When we went out together last weekend, she seemed fine."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0061.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran Ryuguuin】 "That, I don’t know the reason. I only heard it secondhand from her mother, so the details are unclear..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0062.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran Ryuguuin】 "However, it’s certain it's not due to illness. It’s an order from the current head of the Ryuguuin family, <r=ウドウ>Hadou</r>-sama..."]])

    MSG([[Not illness, but a direct order from the head...?]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //effect：セピア加工
FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    -- //CG：着飾されたウラン
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV016aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[I couldn’t help but recall what Uran-san had told me about the Ryuguuin family.]])

    MSG([[Family members treating women like tools. Education ignoring Uran-san’s will. A predetermined way of life since childhood.]])

    MSG([[Maybe the root cause of the Ryuguuin family's distortions is the head, Hadou Ryuguuin.]])

    MSG([[If that’s the case, I can't help but worry about Uran-san’s current situation.]])

    -- //BG：1-A廊下
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013ad")
FILTER_SCREEN(0)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｆ
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1982.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Thank you, Ryuguuin-san. I'll try to do whatever I can."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("yuri_0063.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Uran Ryuguuin】 "Y-yes. I will also share any new information I get. But please be careful, as it involves the Ryuguuin family."]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[After thanking Ryuguuin-san, I immediately went up to the rooftop and contacted Akira on my phone.]])

    -- //BG：屋上
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG017aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1078.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】 "Knock knock, heeey! It’s your Akira-chan!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1983.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "Akira, sorry to bother you, but can you ask someone from the Otohime Group contact you mentioned earlier if they’ve heard anything about the Ryuguuin family lately?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1079.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】 "I can ask... but what’s wrong? Your voice sounds super serious."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1984.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Serious "It's just a rumor, but Uran-san might be taking a leave of absence under the order of the head of the Ryuguuin family. I want to find out the truth."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1080.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】 "Got it, that’s serious. But usually you don’t like getting involved in stuff like this... hehe."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1985.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Surprised "W-why? Did I say something weird?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1081.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】 "Nope, nothing weird. I think that stance of yours, not caring about appearances for someone you like, is totally normal."]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1082.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Akira】 "Leave it to the genius gamer AKIRA. I’ll snag some solid info for you."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1986.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Sad "...Thank you, Akira. I’m sorry for always relying on you."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[After ending the call with Akira, I immediately called someone else.]])

    MSG([[There is one more person I can rely on regarding the Ryuguuin family.]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0396.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】 "Hello, this is Ouga. It’s rare to get a call from Minato this morning; what’s up?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1987.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Sad "Sorry to bother you at work. Actually, Erika heard a rumor that Uran-san might be taking a leave of absence."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0397.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】 "What...? That’s the first I’ve heard of this."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1988.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Erika】Anxious "I-it’s just a rumor secondhand, so I don’t know if it’s true. But Uran-san wasn’t at school today, so I’m a bit worried."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0398.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】 "If that’s true, it’s a serious problem. Minato, share all the information you have. We’ll verify the facts."]])

    MSG([[I could hear anger leaking through the phone from his voice.]])

    MSG([[After telling him everything I knew without hiding anything, Ouga thought for a while and said, "I’ll report back," and ended the call.]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：男子部教室
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[Then, that day at the boys' club, Ouga brought astonishing information.]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav",0)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0399.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "I found out about the Ryuguuin family’s situation. To conclude, Uran Ryuguuin will be withdrawing from the school at the end of this academic year."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1264.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Anxious "W-withdrawing!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[I couldn’t hold back my voice at the unexpected answer.]])

    MSG([[While I was surprised, Ouga continued his explanation.]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0400.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "I don’t know the details, but it seems Uran Ryuguuin went too far against the Ryuguuin family’s policies. To prevent further influence, she’ll continue her education at the family estate from now on."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1265.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Anxious "S-so they’re making her withdraw? They could have sent her to another academy or something..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0401.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "The Ryuguuin family’s policy is that daughters marry after higher education. They probably don’t value academic credentials."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1266.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "What do they think Uran-san is...!"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[My fist trembled with anger toward the Ryuguuin family. How far do they think they can bind Uran-san?]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0402.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Smiling "Heh, your anger sounds just like Lady Erika herself."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1267.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "N-no, this is... um..."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0403.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Don’t worry. I feel the same way. I’ve always been angry about the Ryuguuin family’s traditions, but this time they’ve gone too far."]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0404.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Tell Lady Erika that I promise to bring her and Uran Ryuguuin together..."]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0405.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Because it’s impossible for us to move the Ryuguuin family alone. Lady Erika should talk directly with Uran Ryuguuin and negotiate with her family."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1268.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Serious "Thank you, Ouga. I’ll make sure to tell Erika properly."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[And so, we began our efforts to help Uran-san.]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_06")
end
